description: Basic RESULT message - remote procedure call result

autobahn-python:
from autobahn.wamp.message import Result

# Test framework provides 'msg' with deserialized message
assert isinstance(msg, Result)
assert msg.request == 7814135
assert msg.args == ['Hello, world!']
assert msg.kwargs is None or msg.kwargs == {}

# Check that details are empty/default (all None)
assert msg.progress is None

construction.autobahn-python:
from autobahn.wamp.message import Result

msg = Result(
    request=7814135,
    args=['Hello, world!']
)

notes: RESULT is sent by Dealer to Caller with the result of a remote procedure call. Message format: [RESULT, CALL.Request|id, Details|dict] or [RESULT, CALL.Request|id, Details|dict, YIELD.Arguments|list] or [RESULT, CALL.Request|id, Details|dict, YIELD.Arguments|list, YIELD.ArgumentsKw|dict]
